overview: Servant Je-ho and maiden Mae-hyang are from a respectable family…  One day in the past when it was raining, the two had to love in secret due to the opposition around them. They were secretive but still happier than anyone else. However, several obstacles parted them and they worry they might forget each other. Years pass and they meet as customer and gisaeng. They don’t recognize each other right away but feel attracted to each other in some way…
title: Secret Atelier
